content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: purple_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "elder_guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 40, "index": 18}, {"type": "bucket", "quantity": 12, "index": 21}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 28}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 29}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft purple_stained_glass, I need to place a purple_dye in the center of the crafting table and surround it with glass. I will start by moving the glass from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1
